Name: Eyestorm
About the game: Eyestorm is a helicopter simulator game which takes place on a vast archipelago through forty exhilarating missions. The player must undertake rescue operations for survivors of accidents and shipwrecks, find missing expeditionists or transport important cargos, all within a limited time frame. - Play through 40 exhilarating missions where you undertake rescue operations for survivors of accidents and shipwrecks, find missing people or transport important cargos. - Choose between 3 different helicopters with its very unique own capacities, speeds and degrees of autonomy. - Simulation or Arcade pilot mode. - 5 exclusive helicopter skins. - 9 outstanding islands.
Meta Description: Looking for information on Eyestorm? Check out the release date (Aug 26, 2016), developer insights from 3Crew, and a complete game summary.
